name: Fish or Die
description: Enter a fishing tournament. Climb the leader board with your five biggest trophy fish. Try not to get snagged, lose your lures, or damage your bass boat. Sell fish to earn cash for Tackle Store.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Pentium 4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 700 MB available space
